description:
Lindell & Lavoie, LLP - Minneapolis, Minnesota, Personal Injury Lawyer

Lindell & Lavoie, LLP, is located in Minneapolis and provides aggressive, effective personal injury and wrongful death litigation counsel to individuals, families and injured workers throughout the Twin Cities metropolitan area, southern Minnesota and western Wisconsin. Partners and associates at the law firm offer clients the advantages and benefits of more than 70 combined years of experience and knowledge. The firm's record includes many of the most significant personal injury and workplace accident settlements and claims in Minnesota.

From the moment you start working with your Lindell & Lavoie attorney, you will notice the firm's focus on compassion and understanding. Through meticulous preparation and in-depth investigation into the circumstances of your personal injury, wrongful death or work injury case, the attorneys of Lindell & Lavoie turn that compassion into effective action.

Litigation experience includes (but is not limited to):

  • Car and other types of motor vehicle accidents
  • Injuries suffered in accidents at work
  • Slip-and-fall and other types of premises liability accidents
  • Medical negligence
  • Injuries resulting from defective and dangerous consumer and industrial products
  • Serious dog bites

The law firm handles all personal injury litigation cases on a contingency-fee basis. Clients do not pay a retainer, case preparation costs or attorney fees until they recover monetary damages in a settlement or jury award. If there is no financial recovery, you will not pay fees. The firm offers a free case evaluation with no obligation. Attorneys will be happy to meet with you at your home, hospital room or other convenient location. This firm's lawyers are regularly available to discuss your potential claim without charge, even if the firm does not proceed to represent you.
